card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.property: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A song of life soars over fields of blood.

card.name: Angelic Page
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

card.name: Ardent Militia
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knights fight for honor and mercenaries fight for gold. The militia fights for hearth and home.

card.name: Avatar of Hope
card.property: If you have 3 or less life, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Flying Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

card.name: Aven Cloudchaser
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Aven Flock
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

card.name: Blessed Reversal
card.property: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even an enemy is a valuable resource.

card.name: Blinding Angel
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips their next combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

card.name: Chastise
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens." —Mystic elder

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.property: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.property: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Green
card.property: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.property: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.property: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Crossbow Infantry
card.property: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He can split a marshfly in two from halfway across the range." —Onean sergeant

card.name: Demystify
card.property: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Diving Griffin
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To outrace the griffin —Kipamu expression meaning "to do the impossible"

card.name: Elite Archers
card.property: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fletch their arrows with the feathers of angels.

card.name: Elite Javelineer
card.property: Whenever Elite Javelineer blocks, it deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Precision is frequently more valuable than force."

card.name: Glorious Anthem
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each victory adds a new verse.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The turning of the tide always begins with one soldier's decision to head back into the fray.

card.name: Healing Salve
card.property: Choose one — • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Holy Day
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The day of Spirits; my soul's calm retreat / Which none disturb" —Henry Vaughan, "The Night"

card.name: Holy Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

card.name: Honor Guard
card.property: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them." —Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Intrepid Hero
card.property: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

card.name: Ivory Mask
card.property: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made from its wearer's hopes, the mask ensures that those hopes will be fulfilled.

card.name: Karma
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.

card.name: Master Decoy
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

card.name: Master Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her heart holds the pain of every soldier she's ever healed.

card.name: Noble Purpose
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.

card.name: Oracle's Attendants
card.property: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

card.name: Peach Garden Oath
card.property: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We three, though of separate ancestry, join in brotherhood. . . . We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die the selfsame day." —Peach Garden Oath

card.name: Rain of Blades
card.property: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

card.name: Razorfoot Griffin
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Redeem
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me redeem my brothers both from death." —William Shakespeare, Titus Andronicus

card.name: Rolling Stones
card.property: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me—the walls have more than just ears." —Orcish spy

card.name: Sacred Ground
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land will never betray those who gave their lives for it.

card.name: Sacred Nectar
card.property: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Over the silver mountains, Where spring the nectar fountains, There will I kiss The bowl of bliss; And drink my everlasting fill. . . ." —Sir Walter Raleigh, "The Pilgrimage"

card.name: Samite Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

card.name: Sanctimony
card.property: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the brave are scared by a lion three times: first by its tracks, again by its roar, and one last time face to face. —Somali proverb

card.name: Seasoned Marshal
card.property: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She reads the battlefield like a map, always seeking the shortest route to victory.

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.

card.name: Solidarity
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately." —Benjamin Franklin

card.name: Spirit Link
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am bound to all my children. I share in their joys, I rage at their injuries."

card.name: Standing Troops
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

card.name: Staunch Defenders
card.property: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The key to winning any fight is simply staying alive.

card.name: Story Circle
card.property: As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color. {W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Suntail Hawk
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

card.name: Sunweb
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the wings of fallen dragons refuse to give up the sky.

card.name: Sword Dancer
card.property: {W} {W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most soldiers think of the sword as a weapon. In the hands of Zho monks, swords are also the strongest of shields.

card.name: Tundra Wolves
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains." —Onean scout

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.property: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

card.name: Wall of Swords
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

card.name: Worship
card.property: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol." —Serra

card.name: Wrath of God
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Air Elemental
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

card.name: Archivist
card.property: {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words—so innocent and powerless are they, as standing in a dictionary; how potent for good and evil they become to one who knows how to combine them!" —Nathaniel Hawthorne

card.name: Aven Fisher
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

card.name: Balance of Power
card.property: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To empty your mind is to fill your grave." —Lat-Nam teaching

card.name: Boomerang
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Returne from whence ye came. . . ." —Edmund Spenser, The Faerie Queene

card.name: Bribery
card.property: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.

card.name: Catalog
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though those who study are as many as the hairs on an ox, those who succeed are as rare as unicorns' horns. —Chinese proverb

card.name: Coastal Hornclaw
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

card.name: Coastal Piracy
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."

card.name: Concentrate
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

card.name: Confiscate
card.property: Enchant permanent (Target a permanent as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that permanent.) You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is better to take what does not belong to you than to let it lie around neglected." —Mark Twain, More Maxims of Mark

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

card.name: Cowardice
card.property: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cowards die many times before their deaths; The valiant never taste of death but once." —William Shakespeare, Julius Caesar

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know that secret? The one that wakes you up at night in a cold sweat? The one you think no one else in the world knows? Well, guess what."

card.name: Daring Apprentice
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen my master do this a hundred times. How hard can it be?"

card.name: Deflection
card.property: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The golden rule of revenge: Do unto others what they tried to do unto you.

card.name: Dehydration
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cry to the sun and watch as even your tears forsake you." —Acolyte of Marit Lage

card.name: Evacuation
card.property: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is more unsettling: the roar of battle or the silence that follows?

card.name: Fighting Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars in their ivory towers call them "sharks of the sky." Scholars on the road don't call them at all.

card.name: Flash Counter
card.property: Counter target instant spell.

card.name: Fleeting Image
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow." —Aesop, Fables, trans. Jacobs

card.name: Flight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The College of Lat-Nam is often forced to expel students whose experiments grow too risky or too cruel.

card.name: Hibernation
card.property: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The deep sleep of winter is not always restful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

card.name: Index
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

card.name: Inspiration
card.property: Target player draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success.

card.name: Intruder Alarm
card.property: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One footstep among many is silent. One footstep alone is deafening.

card.name: Invisibility
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Verick held his breath. Breathing wouldn't reveal his position, but it would force him to smell the goblins.

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

card.name: Merchant of Secrets
card.property: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

card.name: Merchant Scroll
card.property: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lat-Nam wizards trade knowledge on scrolls made of magic so they can better guard against thieves and spies.

card.name: Mind Bend
card.property: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.property: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It can pass through solid matter—but that doesn't mean it's harmless.

card.name: Puppeteer
card.property: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Getting people to do what you want is merely a matter of telling them what they want to hear."

card.name: Remove Soul
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Rewind
card.property: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's go over this one more time. . . ."

card.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within each device is a spark of its creator's soul. Within each sage is a lamp that awaits that spark.

card.name: Sage Owl
card.property: Flying When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Sea Monster
card.property: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

card.name: Shifting Sky
card.property: As Shifting Sky enters the battlefield, choose a color. All nonland permanents are the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Master the sky and you rule everything beneath it.—Metathran saying

card.name: Sneaky Homunculus
card.property: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

card.name: Spiketail Hatchling
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It dodges waves of water to prepare for waves of magic.

card.name: Steal Artifact
card.property: Enchant artifact You control enchanted artifact.

card.name: Storm Crow
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

card.name: Telepathy
card.property: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Temporal Adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All of her classmates have disappeared." —Tolarian renegade

card.name: Thieving Magpie
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies steal jewels for theirs.

card.name: Tidal Kraken
card.property: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

card.name: Trade Routes
card.property: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand. {1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise, the righteous, the mighty—the merchant feeds them all.

card.name: Treasure Trove

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wealth means power; the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade." —Emma Goldman, "Anarchism"

card.name: Twiddle
card.property: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Unsummon
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wall of Air
card.property: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When no falcons fly, beware the sky. —Femeref aphorism

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But high she shoots through air and light, Above all low delay, Where nothing earthly bounds her flight, Nor shadow dims her way." —Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

card.name: Wrath of Marit Lage
card.property: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures. Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Marit Lage lies frozen in a glacier's heart. Still her dreams take form in our world, stealing the heat from our souls." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.property: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

card.name: Abyssal Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.property: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Bog Imp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

card.name: Bog Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bodies of its victims are the only tracks it leaves.

card.name: Carrion Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

card.name: Coercion
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,' For exile hath more terror in his look, Much more than death." —William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

card.name: Death Pit Offering
card.property: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits." —Crovax, ascendant evincar

card.name: Death Pits of Rath
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits—that the sudden extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan." —Edgar Allan Poe, "The Pit and the Pendulum"

card.name: Deathgazer
card.property: Whenever Deathgazer blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your entire life passes before its eyes.

card.name: Deepwood Ghoul
card.property: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They feed on the living to stay undead.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.

card.name: Drudge Skeletons
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." —Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

card.name: Dusk Imp
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.

card.name: Eastern Paladin
card.property: {B} {B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no worse enemy. His passion for death doesn't just border on insanity, it wallows in it." —Southern paladin

card.name: Execute
card.property: Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any fool who would die for honor is better off dead." —Cabal Patriarch

card.name: Fallen Angel
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

card.name: Fear
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The horror The horror" —Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

card.name: Gluttonous Zombie
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave." —Crovax, ascendant evincar

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

card.name: Larceny
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Looming Shade
card.property: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

card.name: Lord of the Undead
card.property: Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I confer with Death itself. What could you possibly do to injure me?"

card.name: Maggot Carrier
card.property: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not suddenly fall on death, but advance towards it by slight degrees; we die every day." —Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

card.name: Megrim
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memories cut from the mind can cut right back.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

card.name: Mind Slash
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't think with all that screaming."

card.name: Mind Sludge
card.property: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you get into the swamp, the swamp gets into you.

card.name: Murderous Betrayal
card.property: {B} {B}, Pay half your life, rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which hurts more: a sword in the gut or a dagger in the back?

card.name: Nausea
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

card.name: Nekrataal
card.property: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Nightmare
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

card.name: Persecute
card.property: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of all the tyrannies on humane kind The worst is that which persecutes the mind." —John Dryden, "The Hind and the Panther"

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

card.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death." —Phyrexian progress notes

card.name: Plague Beetle
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows whether they were named for the disease they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.property: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy." —Keld Triumphant

card.name: Primeval Shambler
card.property: {B}: Primeval Shambler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind, like his body, is made up of the swamp's flotsam.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

card.name: Royal Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.property: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Sever Soul
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mortal world is a grove of sweet fruit, and I am ready to harvest it." —Fallen angel

card.name: Severed Legion
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

card.name: Slay
card.property: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

card.name: Soul Feast
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Spineless Thug
card.property: Spineless Thug can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

card.name: Swarm of Rats
card.property: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rats, rats, rats Hundreds, thousands, millions of them, and every one a life." —Bram Stoker, Dracula

card.name: Underworld Dreams
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan." —Rabindranath Tagore

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

card.name: Vampiric Spirit
card.property: Flying When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

card.name: Vicious Hunger
card.property: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the most ravenous soul feeds on the health of the weak.

card.name: Warped Devotion
card.property: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the devout is easily crushed by the loss of hope." —Fallen angel

card.name: Western Paladin
card.property: {B} {B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Expect nothing but scorn, flattery, and lies. And never turn your back on him." —Northern paladin

card.name: Zombify
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." —Mystic elder

card.name: Anaba Shaman
card.property: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just try taking this bull by the horns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the snowy slopes of Kaelor, To the canyons of Bandu, We drink and fight and feast and die As we were born to do." —Balduvian tavern song

card.name: Blaze
card.property: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

card.name: Bloodshot Cyclops
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

card.name: Boil
card.property: Destroy all Islands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When every reef is bared and every wave is dust—only then shall I rest."

card.name: Canyon Wildcat
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the warrior kingdom of Keld, the cats used in the hunt are prized for their tracking sense and ability to climb walls.

card.name: Cinder Wall
card.property: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours." —Onean sergeant

card.name: Demolish
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pound the steel until it fits. Doesn't work? Bash to bits." —Dwarven forging song

card.name: Dwarven Demolition Team
card.property: {T}: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Foolishly, Najib retreated to his castle at El-Abar; the next morning he was dead. In just one night, the dwarven forces had reduced the mighty walls to mere rubble.

card.name: Enrage
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry."

card.name: Flashfires
card.property: Destroy all Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

card.name: Furnace of Rath
card.property: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

card.name: Goblin Chariot
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.property: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's got two arms, one wing, and no brains?" —Ghitu riddle

card.name: Goblin King
card.property: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

card.name: Goblin Raider
card.property: Goblin Raider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit and run.

card.name: Guerrilla Tactics
card.property: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Hammer of Bogardan
card.property: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target. {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bent on a quest for blood, a giant can storm through a fort's wall as if it were nothing more than a picket fence.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.property: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

card.name: Inferno
card.property: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead." —Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Lava Hounds
card.property: Haste When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.

card.name: Lesser Gargadon
card.property: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In some cultures, elephants are ridden by those in power. I don't think a mere elephant would even be noticed in Keld." —Onean sergeant

card.name: Lightning Blast
card.property: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do." —Selenia, dark angel

card.name: Lightning Elemental
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." —William Knox, "Mortality"

card.name: Mana Clash
card.property: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

card.name: Mogg Sentry
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tortured with magic by their masters, the moggs are enflamed by the smell of sorcery.

card.name: Obliterate
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enemy has been destroyed, sir. So have the forest, the city, your palace, your dog . . ." —Keldon soldier

card.name: Ogre Taskmaster
card.property: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogres learn how to smash stuff even before they learn how to walk.

card.name: Okk
card.property: Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks. Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

card.name: Orcish Artillery
card.property: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So they want to kill my men? Well two can play at that game." —General Khurzog

card.name: Orcish Spy
card.property: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You idiot Never let the spies mingle with the orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight" —General Khurzog

card.name: Panic Attack
card.property: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the air burns, only death breathes deep." —Bogardan mage

card.name: Pyrotechnics
card.property: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says lightning never strikes twice?" —Storm shaman

card.name: Raging Goblin
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

card.name: Reflexes
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly." —Combat trainer

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

card.name: Ridgeline Rager
card.property: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

card.name: Rukh Egg
card.property: When Rukh Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

card.name: Sabretooth Tiger
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a sabretooth, all men are mice.

card.name: Searing Wind
card.property: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity." —Keld Triumphant

card.name: Seismic Assault
card.property: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I love lightning It's my best invention since the rock." —Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

card.name: Shock Troops
card.property: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War is a conflict that determines not who is right—but who is left.

card.name: Sizzle
card.property: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight *everything* with fire."—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Stone Rain
card.property: Destroy target land.

card.name: Sudden Impact
card.property: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most people know better. Goblins only know bigger.

card.name: Thieves' Auction
card.property: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under their control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

card.name: Tremor
card.property: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

card.name: Two-Headed Dragon
card.property: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat. {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better." —Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.property: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

card.name: Wall of Stone
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground itself lends its strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Blanchwood Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's never been a dwarven smith who could match the marvels that Gaea herself forges." —Elvish champion

card.name: Call of the Wild

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From a whisper to a roar, the call is heard by all and refused by none.

card.name: Canopy Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

card.name: Choke
card.property: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day we shall walk where once was water." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Collective Unconscious
card.property: Draw a card for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The beasts of the wild are my senses. It is through their eyes that all knowledge shall come to me."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

card.name: Elvish Champion
card.property: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." —Elvish hymn

card.name: Elvish Lyrist
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each pluck of the strings breaks the hold of the unnatural on the world.

card.name: Elvish Pioneer
card.property: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime."

card.name: Elvish Piper
card.property: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. —Elvish teaching

card.name: Elvish Scrapper
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Scrapper: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The stories tell of a distant time when machines overran the forests, destroying everything that lived. That time will not come again."

card.name: Emperor Crocodile
card.property: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

card.name: Fecundity
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The love of nature . . . is a furious, burning, physical greed. . . ." —Mary Webb, The House in Dormer Forest

card.name: Foratog
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Foratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Five hundred years to grow—barely a minute to eat.

card.name: Fungusaur
card.property: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rather than sheltering her young, the female fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

card.name: Fyndhorn Elder
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is useful to be able to speak to the trees. But it is truly wondrous to be able to listen to them."

card.name: Gaea's Herald
card.property: Creature spells can't be countered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves' battle cries cut paths through the Æther, guiding those who would stand in Gaea's defense.

card.name: Giant Badger
card.property: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Disturb a sleeping badger and the snapping of your bones will awaken the countryside.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Watching the spider's web —Llanowar expression meaning "focusing on the wrong thing"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

card.name: Horned Troll
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sword hilts jut from some trolls' bodies where wounds healed so fast that the weapons were trapped inside.

card.name: Hunted Wumpus
card.property: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

card.name: Lhurgoyf
card.property: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!" —Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

card.name: Living Terrain
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some warriors walk the earth. Others are born of it.

card.name: Llanowar Behemoth
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.property: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the forest wants something, no mortal mind can resist her." —Maro

card.name: Maro
card.property: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No two see the same Maro.

card.name: Might of Oaks
card.property: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Get in touch with your inner monster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

card.name: Nantuko Disciple
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unanswered prayers are themselves answers. —Nantuko teaching

card.name: Natural Affinity
card.property: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One touch of nature makes the whole world kin." —William Shakespeare, Troilus and Cressida

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The song of the forest is in perfect harmony. If a single note is out of place, the elves will find its source.

card.name: Plow Under
card.property: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing. —Druids' saying

card.name: Primeval Force
card.property: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has germinated in the earth for thousands of years. Finally it wakes to the battle's call.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

card.name: Regeneration
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should death always have the last word?" —Llanowar druid

card.name: Revive
card.property: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

card.name: Rhox
card.property: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked. {2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Rushwood Dryad
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan" —Wandering mage

card.name: Spitting Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Spreading Algae
card.property: Enchant Swamp When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spreading Algae to its owner's hand.

card.name: Stream of Life
card.property: Target player gains X life.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.property: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.property: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Graceful? Yes. Beautiful? Absolutely. Harmless? Definitely not." —Fyndhorn elder

card.name: Vernal Bloom
card.property: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sun breaks, the beasts stir, and the forest awakens to stand against its enemies.

card.name: Vine Trellis
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature twists knots stronger than any rope.

card.name: Wing Snare
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the hands of the great trees, reaching out to ensnare what threatens their branches." —Elvish hunter

card.name: Wood Elves
card.property: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.property: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

card.name: Aladdin's Ring
card.property: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good lamp will light your way. A good ring will clear it." —Nervan, royal jeweler

card.name: Beast of Burden
card.property: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heavier the load, the harder it works.

card.name: Brass Herald
card.property: As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

card.name: Coat of Arms
card.property: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four, Dunno how to count no more." —Mogg march

card.name: Crystal Rod
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Defense Grid
card.property: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good deal of tyranny goes by the name of protection." —Crystal Eastman, "Equality or Protection"

card.name: Dingus Egg
card.property: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.

card.name: Disrupting Scepter
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True power is controlling not only the hearts of your subjects, but their minds as well."

card.name: Distorting Lens
card.property: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Eye altering alters all." —William Blake, "The Mental Traveller"

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.property: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why build a bridge that needs to be guarded?" —Elvish champion

card.name: Flying Carpet
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woven from strands of griffin mane and pegasus tail.

card.name: Fodder Cannon
card.property: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Step 1: Find your cousin. Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon. Step 3: Find another cousin.

card.name: Howling Mine
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

card.name: Iron Star
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Ivory Cup
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Jayemdae Tome
card.property: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge is power." —Sir Francis Bacon, Meditationes Sacrae

card.name: Millstone
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

card.name: Patagia Golem
card.property: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

card.name: Phyrexian Colossus
card.property: Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step. Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus. Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't think. It doesn't feel. It doesn't laugh or cry. All it does from dusk till dawn Is make the soldiers die. —Onean children's rhyme

card.name: Planar Portal
card.property: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These devices have been known to pull entire worlds through the Æther.

card.name: Rod of Ruin
card.property: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

card.name: Skull of Orm
card.property: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though lifeless, the skull still possessed a strange power over the flow of magic.

card.name: Spellbook
card.property: You have no maximum hand size.

card.name: Star Compass
card.property: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't point north. It points home.

card.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Throne of Bone
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Urza's Armor
card.property: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza protected his body well, but neglected his soul.

card.name: Vexing Arcanix
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to them.

card.name: Wall of Spears
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend." —Onean sergeant

card.name: Wooden Sphere
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: City of Brass
card.property: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Coastal Tower
card.property: Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon in the night, a dream in the fog.

card.name: Elfhame Palace
card.property: Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elfhames are the closest thing to "civilization" the elves allow themselves.

card.name: Salt Marsh
card.property: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only death breeds in stagnant water. —Urborg saying

card.name: Shivan Oasis
card.property: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

card.name: Urborg Volcano
card.property: Urborg Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in the heart of Urborg lie massive volcanoes whose thick black smoke covers the land with perpetual darkness.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the 'training' I needed."

card.name: Vengeance
card.property: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair." —Jules Verne, Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea, trans. Lewis

card.name: Sea Eagle
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It does not wear a crown or sit on a throne of gold, but those who have witnessed its power hail it nonetheless.
